trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Vevay
There were no other sightings in Vevay on or around May 15th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was fishing along the Ohio river with a friend in Vevay, Indiana when out the corner of my right eye i noticed seeing a light through the trees didnt think much of it at first thought it was a plane then turned to look at it and noticed it was just staying there and noticed 2 lights i turned to my friend and said do you see that then turned back to look at it and then it started moving real slow and could see 1 light was white never flashed and the 2nd light was was blueish and never flashed the white light was in front and blue in the back it was solid in between the lights looked the size of a pencil eraser it looked bout 4 inches long and cigar shaped and 500 feet away and bout a few inches above the tree then it took off really fast straight across the river to ghent, ky then it was gone just dissapeared then my friend posted a comment on facebook asking if anyone seen the strange lights over vevay
